headline.main: OUR POLICY STATED; Materials for Soviet Will Be Increased, Secretary Says MISSIONS GO TO MOSCOW U.S. and British Groups Quit London -- Beaverbrook Urges Workers to Get Out Tanks U.S. AID TO SOVIET WILL BE SPEEDED

abstract: Hull says U S will speed aid to USSR
snippet: Hull says U S will speed aid to USSR...

byline.original: By BERTRAM D. HULENSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
